name: Tango
longDescription:
With Tango for Microsoft Teams, keep your team informed with timely notifications.
**Within Microsoft Teams, you will:**

- Receive timely notifications about updates and changes
- Stay informed with real-time alerts within your Teams chats and channels
- Reply directly via chat
**Why Your Team Will Love Tango:**
- Find answers in the tool where they’re working, without switching tabs
- Stay updated with notifications directly within Microsoft Teams, reducing the need for additional communication channels
- Receive clear, real-time alerts, minimizing the risk of missing important updates

**Note:** The following features are available with Tango's browser extension and not directly within the Teams app:

- Create stunning how-to guides
- Get perfectly cropped and annotated screenshots instantly without any special skills
- Update documentation quickly and easily
- Embed in your knowledge base or public web pages
- Export to PDF, HTML, or Markdown
- Protect sensitive information with advanced blur features
- Analytics to see who’s viewed your workflows and where people are getting stuck

*Tango is free to use, with Pro and Enterprise plans to suit every team’s needs.* Note: In order to use this app. Users must have an active Tango account. [Sign Up here](https://app.tango.us/sign-up). Should you need any help, please contact [support@tango.us](mailto:support@tango.us) for more details.
shortDescription: Frictionlessly share knowledge with your entire team.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Tango Can you help me set up the knowledge sharing configurations?
examplePrompts.description: User is asking the bot for assistance in setting up configurations.
User is requesting help from the bot.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Tango What are the steps to configure knowledge sharing?
examplePrompts.description: User seeks guidance on how to configure their knowledge sharing settings.
